title: Microsoft L63
content:
Education: Tier 3
Years of Experience: 5 years
Prior Experience: FAANG
Current CTC: 70 LPA
Date of the Offer: Mar 2024
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: L63
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 47L
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 7 + 3L
Stock bonus: $180K for 4 years
Perf Bonus: ~15% = 7,05,000
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~98.3 first year
Benefits: Cab, 200Rs daily for food, 30k mental wellness reimbursement, standard insurance and dental+vision

Negotiated a bit. Took the offer.

title: Google | L4 | Hyderabad
content:
Years of Experience: 7.6
Prior Experience: Currently working in a Service based company.
Date of the Offer: APR 2024
Company: Google
Title/Level: L4 - Application Engineer
Location: Hyderabad
Salary: 31.4L + 2.6L(PF + Grat..)
Signing Bonus: 4.85 L
Stock bonus: 69000$ vesting over 4 years (38, 32, 20, 10 vesting)
Perf Bonus: 4.71L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): First year - 62L 
My current compensation :  21LPA

I know I am being low balled.
But I am quite grateful and happy with the offer.

title: PhonePe Senior Software Engineer Offer Evaluation
content:
Education: B.Tech from a Tier 1.5 College
YOE: Almost 4 year
Prior Experience: SDE 2 at a FAANG (40L Base + 23 RSU)
Date of Offer: April 2024
Company: Phonepe
Title/Level: Software Engineer
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 48,00,000 INR
Relocation Bonus: N/A
Joining Bonus: 5,00,000
Retention Bonus: 2,00,000
Stock bonus: 45 Lakh ESOP/4 years
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~65 LPA for first year
Benefits: Standard Phonepe Benefits.

Other Details 
* Concerned about the WLB and culture in PhonePe 
* Have following competing Offers 
	* Early Stage Startup [43 Base + 1 Relocation + 4 Retention + 0.5 Equity vested over 4 years] (Not Inclined due to talent there) 
	* US Remote Data Tagging with Software Dev 41$ per hour approx 65 LPA But don't like the work at all 
* Have interviews lined up for ByteDance-Dubai and Google L4
